manual_compliance_items.title: Visa Account Funding Transaction (AFT) Mandate - MENA/UK/EEA
manual_compliance_items.summary: Visa mandates full Account Funding Transaction (AFT) implementation for crypto (6051), securities/brokerage (6211), and gambling (7995) merchants operating in MENA, UK, and EEA regions. This is a hard deadline with no extensions expected.
technical_requirements: Mandatory AFT implementation for all applicable transactions
Enhanced sender and recipient data collection
manual_compliance_items.notes: Verified March 2026 deadline for MENA region from Checkout.com compliance bulletin. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: Mastercard AFT Mandate for Crypto/Securities in Canada
manual_compliance_items.summary: Mastercard extends AFT mandate to Canadian crypto merchants (6051) and securities brokers (6211). All qualifying merchants must implement Account Funding Transactions by April 15, 2026 to continue processing Mastercard transactions.
technical_requirements: Implement AFT API for crypto and securities transactions
Enhanced KYC and AML data collection
manual_compliance_items.notes: Verified deadline for Canadian crypto and securities markets. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: Visa AFT Recipient Data Requirements
manual_compliance_items.summary: Mandatory recipientDetails fields for crypto and forex AFT transactions. Must include DOB, full address, and account details in all AFT API requests.
manual_compliance_items.notes: Missing or incorrectly formatted parameters will cause transaction declines. Visa may apply non-compliance assessments. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: UK Gambling Commission - Bonus Wagering Restrictions
manual_compliance_items.summary: LCCP Code 5.1.1 limits wagering requirements on bonuses and bans cross-product incentives (e.g., sports + casino combined).
technical_requirements: Cap wagering requirements on bonus offers
Prevent mixing products in single incentives
manual_compliance_items.notes: Non-compliance may result in licence review, fines up to Â£20M, or suspension. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: UK Gambling Commission - Financial Key Event Reporting Updates
manual_compliance_items.summary: LCCP 15.2.1 raises ownership reporting threshold from 3% to 5%. Expands to entities without share capital. All loans must be reported.
technical_requirements: Update key event reporting to 5% shareholding
manual_compliance_items.notes: Complex structures must be clearly reported. Failure triggers licence review. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: UK Gambling Commission - Remote Technical Standards (RTS 12B)
manual_compliance_items.summary: Updated definitions for deposit limits and loss limits. Net deposit limit introduced.
manual_compliance_items.notes: Required for all remote platforms. Non-compliance affects player protection licensing. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: US GENIUS Act - Stablecoin Implementation Regulations
manual_compliance_items.summary: Federal stablecoin framework implementation. Regulators must finalize licensing, capital, custody, and AML requirements.
manual_compliance_items.notes: Unlicensed issuers cannot operate in US. Foreign issuers need approval. Reshape dollar-backed stablecoin market. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: California Digital Financial Assets Law (DFAL) Compliance
manual_compliance_items.summary: California requires licensing for all crypto business activity with CA residents. DFPI enforcement begins.
technical_requirements: Obtain DFPI license for CA operations
manual_compliance_items.notes: Operating without license = fines + shutdown. California is largest US crypto market. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: CFTC Blockchain Technology in Capital Markets
manual_compliance_items.summary: CFTC finalizing regulations on blockchain use in capital markets. Part of 12-month 'crypto sprint' initiative.
technical_requirements: Assess blockchain integration with CFTC regs
manual_compliance_items.notes: Enables tokenized collateral in derivatives. Blockchain-based settlement gets regulatory clarity. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: UAE CBUAE - Virtual Asset Licensing Compliance
manual_compliance_items.summary: One-year grace period ends for Federal Decree-Law No. 6/2025. All crypto/DeFi must have CBUAE licensing or cease UAE operations.
technical_requirements: Obtain CBUAE license or partner with licensed entity
manual_compliance_items.notes: Criminal penalties: imprisonment + fines AED 50K-500M. Admin fines up to AED 1B. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: Federal Reserve Skinny Master Account Program
manual_compliance_items.summary: FRB aims to launch 'skinny master accounts' for crypto firms. Limited payment services access without full bank charter.
technical_requirements: Apply for skinny master account (if eligible)
manual_compliance_items.notes: Enables direct Fed access for payment firms. Reduces reliance on third-party banks. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: DTC Tokenization Pilot Launch
manual_compliance_items.summary: Depository Trust Company launching 3-year pilot to tokenize DTC-custodied assets on blockchain. SEC no-action letter granted.
technical_requirements: Assess eligibility for DTC tokenization pilot
Update settlement systems for tokenized securities
manual_compliance_items.notes: Pilot only, limited scope. Watch for broader tokenization implications. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: EU/UK Crypto Travel Rule - Zero Threshold Enforcement
manual_compliance_items.summary: EU Transfer of Funds Regulation and UK FCA guidance: ALL crypto transfers (any amount) must include full sender/recipient details.
technical_requirements: Collect originator/beneficiary data for ALL transactions
Document reasonable efforts for non-compliant counterparties
manual_compliance_items.notes: Zero threshold = massive operational shift. Every transaction needs full KYC data. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: Crypto Asset Reporting Framework (CARF) - First Information Exchange
manual_compliance_items.summary: Tax authorities worldwide begin first exchanges of crypto transaction data. OECD framework for crypto tax reporting.
technical_requirements: Maintain transaction records for tax purposes
manual_compliance_items.notes: Global crypto tax reporting begins. Non-compliance = penalties + audit risk. Hard-locked.

manual_compliance_items.title: Crypto Gambling Enhanced Responsible Gaming Requirements
manual_compliance_items.summary: Global regulators expanding responsible gambling frameworks to crypto platforms. Real-time monitoring, self-exclusion, deposit limits mandatory.
technical_requirements: Maintain audit trail across multiple blockchains
manual_compliance_items.notes: Crypto gambling platforms face same responsible gaming rules as fiat. Non-compliance = fines + license suspension. Hard-locked.
